data.name: Worlds Adrift - Captain Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become a Founder



Get Immediate Access to the Worlds Adrift Closed Beta - Limited Packs Available.

This is the Worlds Adrift Captain Founder's Pack.

The Captain Pack includes the relevant items below:

To purchase a Wanderer or Captain pack, please visit the Worlds Adrift game Steam page.



*These items will be made available at a future date, once Worlds Adrift has progressed to Open Beta on Steam Early Access.

**Closed Beta is currently only available across North America, and Europe. Other territories are being added this year. To find out when your territory is coming online – please visit our FAQ.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400, AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 SE, AMD R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i7-2600K, AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
